posts.text:
아시아나국제단편영화제 [영화 리뷰] 제15회 아시아나국제단편영화제 국내경쟁2 - 이웃에 방해가 되지 않는 선/대자보/율리안나/조인성을 좋아하세요. 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/sgnam10/221134676870 [영화 리뷰] 제15회 아시아나국제단편영화제 국내경쟁2 -
이웃에 방해가 되지 않는 선/대자보/율리안나/조인성을 좋아하세요.
이웃에 방해가 되지 않는 선
감독 : 신지훈
한양대학교 연극영화학과 졸업 후 한양대 연극영화학과 MFA 재학 중입니다.
남자는 광고 전단지를 돌리며 생계를 유지하고 있다. 광고 전단지를 돌리던 중 문이 살짝 열려있는 집을 발견한다. 남자는 저녁 값만 훔쳐 나오자는 생각을 하고 집에 들어간다. 집 안에는 조용하고 굳게 닫힌 문이 있다. 건진 것 없이 나오려던 남자는 닫힌 문을 열어보고자 한다. 억지로 굳게 닫힌 문을 열자 자살한 노인과 여자 아이의 시신이 있다. 그때 누군가 초인종을 울린다.
신지훈 감독이 연출한 단편영화 <이웃에 방해가 되지 않는 선>은 광고 전단지를 돌리던 중 문이 살짝 열려있는 집을 발견하고 저녁 값만 훔쳐 나오자는 생각을 하고 집에 들어간 남자가 자살한 노인과 여자 아이의 시신을 보며 발생하는 이야기를 그려내어 인상적이다. 초인종을 누르는 아파트 주민과 사회복지사가 등장하며 극적 긴장감이 발생하고, 남자는 자살한 노인 옆에 여자 아이가 죽은 것이 아니라 살아 있는 것을 알게 되고 여자 아이를 도와주기 위해 노력한다. 영화 마지막 장면에 '장례를 치워야 할 비용'을 놓아두고 가는 남자의 뒷모습이 인상적이다. 단편영화 <이웃에 방해가 되지 않는 선>은 '이웃에 방해가 되지 않는 선'에서 우리가 할 수 있는 최선의 방법은 무엇인가를 고민하는 작품이 아닐까?
대자보(A Hand-written Poster)
감독 : 곽은미
2015년 한국영화아카데미 영화연출을 졸업했다. 단편영화 <열정의 끝>(2015)은 전주국제영화제, 미쟝센단편영화제, 서울독립영화제 등 다수 영화제에서 상영되었으며 여성인권영화제에서 ‘피움 관객상’, 2016년 애티우다&애니마국제영화제에서 ‘심사위원 명예언급상’을 수상하였다. 이밖에 연출작으로는 단편영화 <서정의 상실>(2015), 신영균예술문화재단 제작지원작인 <첫 데이트>(2012), <갈거야>(2011) 등이 있다.
대학생 혜리는 대자보를 써서 교수로부터 고소를 당한 날, 함께 쓴 친구 민영을 만나러 문학동아리로 향한다.
단편영화 <대자보>를 연출한 곽은미 감독은 자신의 영화를 보고 나서 관객이 비록 힘든 웃음을 지을지라도 희망을 주고 싶었다고 이야기한다. 영화 <대자보>는 흑백으로 촬영된 작품으로 인상적인데, 이는 대자보가 주는 색감과 두 개의 양분되는 생각을 의미하기 때문이다. 곽은미 감독은 영화 <대자보>가 멀리서 지켜보는 영화가 아니라 '그 자리에 같이 있으면서 체험하는' 작품이 되었으면 한다고 말한다.
율리안나(Juliana)
감독 : 김도준
한국예술종합학교 영상원에 재학 중이다. <공습경보>(2014)를 연출했다.
정릉 스카이 아파트는 서울에서 가장 오래된 아파트다. 1968년 서울시는 수도방어를 위해 북악스카이웨이를 건설하면서 배밭골의 무허가판자촌을 강제철거 하였는데, 이곳의 빈민들을 수용하기 위해 급하게 지은 건축물이 스카이아파트다. 2008년에 재난위험시설로 지정된 이후 주민모두가 떠나간 이곳에서 할머니 한 사람만이 이주명령을 거부한 채 유령처럼 살아가고 있다.
단편영화 <율리안나>를 연출한 김도준 감독은 정릉 스카이 아파트는 도시 빈민의 역사가 겹쳐있는 장소이며 오랫동안 이곳에 살고 있는 할머니와 이곳에 들어온 낯선 남자를 통해 새로운 빈민의 이야기를 보여주고자 했다. 김도준 감독은 실제로 영화 현장에서 이 영화에 등장한 할머니 역의 배우와 많은 대화를 나누었으며 대사의 절반은 할머니가 쓴 것이라고 이야기한다.
자살을 하기 위해 강제철거를 준비하는 정릉 스카이 아파트에 들어온 남자와 아파트를 지키기 위한 할머니의 만남이 인상적이다. 영화의 마지막 장면에서 반대로 남자는 삶을 이어가게 되고 할머니가 자살을 선택하여 충격적이다. 어린 시절 아들을 잃은 할머니가 남자의 삶을 구원해준듯이 영화의 결말이 잊혀지지 않는다. 단편영화 <율리안나>는 가난과 죽음, 삶의 터전에 대해 생각해보는 작품으로 훌륭하다.
조인성을 좋아하세요.(LOVE JO. RIGHT NOW.)
감독 : 정가영
1990년생. 2012년 영상원을 중퇴하고 독립적으로 영화를 만들고 있다. 단편을 주욱 찍다가 2016년 장편 <비치온더비치>로 데뷔했다. 두 편째 장편 <밤치기>(2017)의 개봉을 앞두고 있다.
영화감독 가영은 조인성을 캐스팅하고 싶다 아직 시나리오는 없지만.
단편영화 <조인성을 좋아하세요.>을 연출한 정가영 감독은 이 영화에서 '가영'이라는 인물이 자신과 같은 인물이라고 말한다. 이 영화는 사적인 영화감독 가영의 첫번째 작품이다. 정가영 감독은 실제로 단편영화 <조인성을 좋아하세요.>를 촬영하기 위해 배우 조인성을 직접 만났다고 흐뭇한 미소를 전했다. 실제로 정가영 감독은 영화 <더킹>를 관람한 후 꿈속에 조인성이 나온 경험이 있다고 말한다.
정가영 감독은 자신이 혼자 출연하는 영화를 만들고 싶었고, 혼자만의 넋두리를 해보고 싶었다고 이야기한다. 정가영 감독은 영화 <조인성을 좋아하세요.>를 촬영하면서 조인성 배우가 애드립을 매번 다르게 연기하여 좋은 대사들을 영화에서 사용할 수 있었다고 말한다.
정가영 감독이 연출한 단편영화 <조인성을 좋아하세요.>는 조인성을 영화에 캐스팅하려는 영화감독의 유쾌한 이야기를 담아내어 즐겁게 관람할 수 있는 작품으로 흥미롭다.

thread.title: The Round Pen's Most Important Lesson
thread.title_full: The Round Pen's Most Important Lesson

posts.author: Steve Edwards (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: The Round Pen's Most Important Lesson
posts.text:
We practice natural horsemanship not merely because it creates better horses, but because it creates better people. In order to become a better person one must recognize the most important change that the round pen can make in a person.

Properly conducted natural horsemanship will lead one to absolutely loose all desire to control the behavior of other people. Natural horsemanship allows one to understand that lasting power comes from leadership that does not seek that power. One learns that control is not power.

The older I get the more I pity those who love policy, procedure, rules, order, and straight lines. I recognize each of those things for what they are--tools of coercive control that assure the unhappiness both of those who are controlled and those who seek to control others. 

" Just as I would be not a slave, neither would I be a slave owner."--Abraham Lincoln


That does not mean that we teach anarchy. The round pen teaches one that leadership is best demonstrated from the front, not the rear. There is a reason that it is not called "pushership." The round pen teaches one to encourage, support, and inspire others. 

The round pen gives one the confidence to teach others to be confident.

And it does so in the simplest of ways. Force does not work in the round pen. The simple reality is that the 200 pound man can only "control" 800 pound horse by letting the horse know that it is safe in his presence. 

When it is all said and done the only control that truly creates power is self control. The only confidence that is contagious is self confidence. 

Selfishness creates the illusion of power. Selflessness shatters that illusion.

The round pen can a place of spiritual awakening. The round pen, and all of natural horsemanship,is nothing but a teaching ground for unconditional love. 

Ad if you are not taking advantage o everything that the round pen has to offer, you are letting your horse down. You are letting yourself down.

And you are letting every person in our life down.

thread.title: Единый выбора ноутбука #48
thread.title_full: /hw/ - Единый выбора ноутбука тред #48

posts.author: Аноним
posts.text:
>>2505790
Подставка для ноута - для последней попытки решить очевидные проблемы малой кровью.
Эффективность сильно разнится, потому что этих семи-десяти градусов может быть как достачно для качественного изменения, так и мёртвому припарки.
Так, когда-то я одному товарищу "поборол" троттлинг его говнорайзера-13. Температура в загрузке снизилась с 82 до 73 - и этого оказалось достаточно, чтобы у него машинка перестала тупить (хотя ноутбуком от этого называться не стала).
Если ноут у тебя по каким-то причинам что-то реально считает, то опять же, подставкой можно смягчить боль - хотя поставить машину с нормальным охлаждением считать это же самое всяко лучше.
Главная проблема подставки - то, что её с собой не потаскаешь - то есть ноут превращается в хуёвый десктоп.
Иногда работает как временное решение (которое часто остаётся на постоянку).

thread.title: Can we just get rid of k/d tracking on the scoreboard? - Page 34
thread.title_full: Can we just get rid of k/d tracking on the scoreboard? - Page 34 — Battlefield Forums

posts.author: disposalist
posts.text:
People seem to have strayed from the OP or completely ignored it. The OP was talking about the problem caused by people who focus on the stat, not whether it's a good measure of ability.
Aside from TDM and maybe even Dom, if players concentrate on KD above everything else, it is to their team's detriment and that if DICE emphasise the stat then people will tend to concentrate on it.
I happen to agree with the OP that de-emphasising kills would improve objectives-based games. Remember in the original version of Conquest, kills got no ticket-score at all. The de-emphasis compared to other FPSs was clear and obvious. These days it is getting more and more like any other deathmatch-based FPS.
Having said all that, DICE have made much more effort to emphasise team/squad/objectives play than other FPS producers. It's why I play BF and not CoD, etc. The OP (and I) would suggest they could/should do more, though. Perhaps there's just nothing you can do to persuade some players that in an objectives-based game you should be looking to prioritise, er, playing the objectives...
"We need more medics". "So? I want to play sniper and get kills"
"We need that tank taking out". "So? I get more kills in CQC with my automatico. I get killed taking on tanks"
"We really need that tank taking out". "So? I can farm infantry in the light tank and might get killed if I go up against another tank"
"We need more attacking that objective". "So? I will get more kills firing onto the objective"
"We need to advance with the frontline". "So? I get more kills waiting for them to advance"
"We need to take flags". "So? I get more kills sitting in this choke point throwing grenades"
Etc.

thread.title: Tokmok town celebrates 150th anniversary
thread.title_full: Tokmok town celebrates 150th anniversary

posts.title: Tokmok town celebrates 150th anniversary
posts.text:
Tokmok town celebrates 150th anniversary Kyrgyzstan | society | 13:10, 07 November 2017 | 161 
AKIPRESS.COM - Tokmok town holds on November 7 festive events dedicated to the 150th anniversary of the town. 
Tokmok, a home to around 58,000 inhabitants, was established as a northern military outpost of the Khanate of Kokand ca. 1830. 
Thirty years later, it fell to the Russians who demolished the fort. The modern town was founded on 13 May 1864 by Major-General Mikhail Chernyayev. 
Currently, the city of Tokmok is a district-level administrative unit of Chuy region. 
About 15 km south of Tokmok is the 11th-century Burana Tower, located on the grounds of an ancient citadel of which today only a large earthen mound remains. This is believed to be the site of the ancient city of Balasagun, founded by the Sogdians and later for some time the capital of the Kara-Khanid empire. A large collection of ancient gravestones and bal-bals is nearby. Excavated Scythian artifacts have been moved to museums in St. Petersburg and Bishkek. 
The population of Tokmok is mostly made up of Kyrgyz and ethnic Russians. Other ethnic groups include Dungans and Uzbeks.

thread.title_full: Berlusconi se relance une nouvelle fois en Italie via la Sicile

posts.author: rédaction
posts.title: Berlusconi se relance une nouvelle fois en Italie via la Sicile
posts.text:
7/11/17 - 10h15 Source: Belga Silvio Berlusconi lors d'un meeting à Catane, Sicile, le 2 novembre 2017. © reuters. La droite emmenée par Silvio Berlusconi, éternel revenant de la politique italienne, a remporté les élections régionales de dimanche en Sicile, devant les populistes du Mouvement 5 Etoiles (M5S), selon des résultats définitifs rendus publics mardi. 
Après dépouillement des bulletins de vote de la totalité des 5.300 bureaux, Nello Musumeci, soutenu par Silvio Berlusconi (Forza Italia, centre droit) et Matteo Salvini (La Ligue, extrême droite), a obtenu 39,84% des voix contre 34,65% au candidat du M5S Giancarlo Cancelleri. Déception pour le M5S À quelques mois d'élections législatives prévues début 2018, le scrutin est en deçà des espérances du M5S, qui ambitionnait de remporter sa première région, et constitue un sérieux revers pour le centre gauche au pouvoir. Inoxydable Berlusconi Il consacre l'énième retour sur la scène politique de Silvio Berlusconi, ancien chef du gouvernement, magnat des médias et véritable sphinx de la vie politique dans la péninsule, à 81 ans révolus. Défaite cuisante pour le centre gauche au pouvoir Fabrizio Micari, candidat du Parti démocrate (PD, au pouvoir) de Matteo Renzi, a certes réussi à limiter les dégâts par rapport à son adversaire à gauche Claudio Fava, avec 18,65% pour le premier contre 6,14% pour le second, mais la défaite reste cuisante pour le centre gauche, qui gouvernait l'île depuis cinq ans. Dernier test avant les législatives de 2018 Le scrutin de dimanche représentait le dernier test grandeur nature - 4,5 millions d'électeurs - avant les législatives qui devraient se dérouler entre février et avril prochain. なんか総合格闘をいち早く着目してあの攻防システムをあの時代に
取り入れてた格闘ゲームっていうだけで本当に先駆者と言えるんだが
当時も今もやってみて思うのはラッシュのオートとかはイマイチだな。
もうひとつファイティングウォーズ２的なものがあればと思ったが
SFCの方は操作感覚が悪くなってしまってたからな…。
ハイパーバージョンか海外版ならだいぶマシと思えるが。

posts.author: Treehouse (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: ข่าวดี...วัดพระธรรมกายเนเธอร์แลนด์ได้รับอนุมัติเป็นสมาชิกของสหภาพพุทธเนเธอร์แลนด์แล้ว
posts.text:
สหภาพพุทธเนเธอร์แลนด์ เป็นองค์กรที่เป็นที่ประชุมรวมของสมาคมพุทธศาสนาหลากหลายนิกายในเนเธอร์แลนด์ 

 โดยสหภาพพุทธนั้นมีอยู่หลายประเทศในยุโรป มีหน้าที่เจรจากับรัฐบาลเกี่ยวกับสิทธิทางกฎหมาย เช่น สิทธิที่จะขอวีซ่าให้กับพระ สิทธิที่จะออกรายการเกี่ยวกับพระพุทธศาสนาในโทรทัศน์ 
สหภาพพุทธฯยุโรปมีสมาชิกจากสหภาพพุทธฯหลายประเทศในยุโรป 
เป็นเรื่องที่น่ายินดีว่า   เดือนพฤศจิกายน ปี 2560 นี้ วัดพระธรรมกายเนเธอร์แลนด์ ได้รับอนุมัติเป็นสมาชิกของสหภาพพุทธเนเธอร์แลนด์แล้ว... เป็นอีกก้าว ของความก้าวหน้าของงานเผยแผ่พระพุทธศาสนาในทวีปยุโรป ขอสาธุชนทั้งหลายได้อนุโมทนาบุญร่วมกัน 
วัดพระธรรมกายเนเธอร์แลนด์ สถานที่ปฏิบัติธรรมและอบรมศีลธรรมตามหลักพุทธศาสนาในประเทศเนเธอร์แลนด์ 

รู้จักวัดพระธรรมกายเนเธอร์แลนด์ 
วัดพระธรรมกายเนเธอร์แลนด์มีพิธีเปิดวัดใหม่ในวันที่ 20 พฤษภาคม 2560 ที่ผ่านมา 

โดยสำนักข่าวท้องถิ่นของประเทศเนเธอร์แลนด์ ลงบทสัมภาษณ์ "พระอาจารย์ซันเดอร์ เขมธัมโม " ลงในหนังสือพิมพ์ " DeGelderlander" 

ซึ่งท่านได้เมตตาเล่าถึงที่มาและวัตถุประสงค์ของการบุกเบิกสถาปนา " วัดพระธรรมกายเนเธอร์แลนด์ " โดยการปรับปรุง "โบสถ์เซนต์วิคเตอร์" ซึ่งเป็นศาสนสถานสำคัญประจำเมืองอัฟเฟอแด   พัฒนาให้เป็นสถานที่ปฏิบัติธรรม และแหล่งอบรมศีลธรรม ตามหลักพระพุทธศาสนา  


ทั้งนี้ ชาวท้องถิ่นหรือผู้สนใจทั่วไป ที่เปิดใจเข้ามาฝึกสมาธิและศึกษาเรียนรู้พระพุทธศาสนานั้น ไม่จำเป็นต้องเปลี่ยนความเชื่อมาเป็นชาวพุทธ แต่ขอเพียงมีการประพฤติปฏิบัติตามแนวทางของชาวพุทธ 

ในพิธีมอบกุญแจโบสถ์ ให้กับตัวแทนคณะสงฆ์  บาทหลวงได้กล่าวถ้อยคำสุดท้ายไว้ ณ สถานที่แห่งนี้ อย่างน่าประทับใจ ว่า  ... 
"ร้อยยี่สิบห้าปี ภายในโบสถ์หลังนี้ ได้มีการฉลองชีวิตใหม่ และการรำลึกถึงผู้ล่วงลับ ตามแนวทางของศาสนาคริสต์ แม้บัดนี้ ก็ยังคงมีการทำสมาธิ พิจารณาถึงความตาย และการเกิดใหม่ แต่ทว่า เป็นไปตามแนวทางของพระพุทธเจ้า"

posts.title: Axudas do Igape para novos emprendedores, cofinanciadas polo Fondo Europeo de Desenvolvemento Rexional, no marco do programa operativo Feder Galicia 2014-2020.
posts.text:
Poderán ser beneficiarias destas axudas as pequenas e medianas empresas segundo a definición establecida pola Comisión Europea no anexo I do Regulamento (UE) nº 651/2014 (DOUE L 187, do 26 de xuño), polo que se declaran determinadas categorías de axuda compatibles co mercado interior en aplicación dos artigos 107 e 108 do Tratado, nas cales non concorra algunha das circunstancias previstas no artigo 10.2 e 3 da Lei 9/2007, do 13 de xuño, de subvencións de Galicia (DOG nº 121, do 25 de xuño). Prazo de presentación ata  30/11/2017. 

+ Xunta

thread.title: Επιτέλους οι Αμερικανοί... ψελλίζουν μέσω «αναλυτών»: «Αν πάρει η Τουρκία τους S-400 να ξεχάσει τα F-35»
thread.title_full: Επιτέλους οι Αμερικανοί... ψελλίζουν μέσω «αναλυτών»: «Αν πάρει η Τουρκία τους S-400 να ξεχάσει τα F-35»

posts.author: ΘΑΝΟΣ ΚΟΥΚ (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Επιτέλους οι Αμερικανοί... ψελλίζουν μέσω «αναλυτών»: «Αν πάρει η Τουρκία τους S-400 να ξεχάσει τα F-35»
posts.text:
Γράφει ο Θεόφραστος Ανδρεόπουλος 


Επιτέλους οι Αμερικανοί άρχισαν να... ψελλίζουν έστω και μέσω «αναλυτών» ότι η Τουρκία μπορεί να μην παραλλάβει τα F-35 εάν προχωρήσει στην αγορά των ρωσικών S-400. 

Βέβαια από τους αναλυτές μέχρι την επίσημη τοποθέτηση επί του θέματος από την αμερικανική πολιτική ηγεσία έχουμε πολύ δρόμο ακόμα, αλλά εάν τελικώς οι Τούρκοι ολοκληρώσουν την συμφωνία (δηλαδή παραλάβουν τους S-400) με την Μόσχα τότε οι Αμερικανοί δεν θα έχουν άλλη επιλογή από το να αντιδράσουν ηχηρώς αλλιώς θα έχουν γίνει κυριολεκτικά «ρόμπες» όπως λέγεται λαϊκά. 

Έτσι λοιπόν μιλώντας στο αμερικανικό CNBC οι «αναλυτές» οι οποίοι εκφράζουν τις απόψεις του «βαθέως αμερικανικού κράτους» επιχειρώντας να εφαρμόσουν την τακτική «καρότο και μαστίγιο» είπαν:   
«Μην εκπλαγείτε εάν αυτή η συμφωνία για τους S-400 δεν δει ποτέ το φως της ημέρας» είπε ο Richard Safran, αμυντικός αναλυτής στο Buckingham Research στην New York. 
«Η τουρκική κατάσταση εμφανίζεται να χειροτερεύει»   

Σημειώνεται ότι την προηγούμενη εβδομάδα ο επικεφαλής της Στρατιωτικής Επιτροπής του NATO στρατηγός Petr Pavel, είπε κατά την διάρκεια μιας ημερίδας στην Washington ότι η Τουρκία εάν προχωρήσει τελικώς την αγορά του ρωσικού συστήματος «θα αντιμετωπίσει συνέπειες » 

Υπενθυμίζεται ότι η Τουρκία θέλει να κάνει συμπαραγωγή των S-400 σε μια προσπάθεια να φτιάξει δική της αμυντική βιομηχανία με όλες τις πιθανές εξειδικεύσεις. 

Αυτό όμως σημαίνει ότι η Μόσχα θα πρέπει να μοιραστεί την τεχνογνωσία με την Άγκυρα κάτι που δεν είναι επιτρεπτό. 

Υπάρχει και το ζήτημα της διαδραστικότητας του συστήματος με ΝΑΤΟϊκές ένοπλες δυνάμεις. Κανένα μέλος του ΝΑΤΟ δεν επιχειρεί το σύστημα αυτό . 

«Δεν πιστέυω ότι θα συμβεί» είπε ο Luke Coffey, διευθυντής του Allison Center for Foreign Policy at the Heritage Foundation, ένα συντηρητικό think tank. 

Πιστεύει ότι η Άγκυρα χρησιμοποιεί τους Ρώσους σαν μοχλό πίεσης για κάποια καλύτερη συμφωνία με τις ΗΠΑ ή εναν ευρωπαϊκό κράτος για την απόκτηση ενός αντιαεροπορικού συστήματος. 

Όμως όπως αναφέρει ο αναλυτής του Wolfe Hunter Keay ο ίδιος ο Εrdogan είπε ότι υπάρχουν συζητήσεις ακόμα και για τους S-500. 

Και ο ίδιος αναλυτής είπε αυτό που αναρωτιόμαστε όλοι τους τελευταίους μήνες: «Δεν περιμένουμε από την Τουρκία να αλλάξει πάλι πορεία αλλά περαιτέρω αποξένωση από το ΝΑΤΟ και στενότεροι δεσμοί με την Ρωσία θα μπορούσαν να θέσουν σε κίνδυνο υπάρχοντα προγράμματα όπως αυτό του F-35»   

Σε λίγους μήνες η Τουρκία θα παραλάβει το πρώτης F-35 από ένα σύνολο 100 μονάδων. 
Μένει να δούμε αν αυτό τελικά θα πραγματοποιηθεί, πάντως οι ΗΠΑ παίζουν πλέον το ήδη πληγωμένο γόητρό τους. 

πηγή

thread.title: The e-book has changed everything
thread.title_full: The e-book has changed everything

posts.author: RJ Harlick (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: The e-book has changed everything
posts.text:
By R.J. Harlick 
How do you pick what book/s you’re going to read? Is it the cover? Awards it’s won. The author. Genre? Word of mouth? Reviews (pro and customer)? Someone you know? Anything else? 
This has proven to be an interesting question. At first glance I thought it would be easy, but as I started to go over how I select books, I realized my approach had changed over time because of e-books. Yes, I have become primarily an e-book reader. These days I rarely pick up a printed book, unless it is one by a friend. 
Gone are the days when I used to spend many an enjoyable hour browsing through the shelves of a bookstore. Sorry booksellers. Since I was a ‘pantser’, still am for that matter, I was never organized enough to have lists of authors or books I wanted to read. So I would rely on the cover. A good cover would help me narrow down the selection. I am one of those people that forget the names of authors. Yes, I know I am one. While I will remember the title and what the book is about, my mind's a blank when it comes to the author’s name. So I rarely searched the shelves for actual authors. Instead I would look for interesting covers. If the blurb on the back sparked my interest, I would leaf through the book to get a sense of the writing. Sometimes awards mattered. The price was also a consideration. If I thought it too pricey, back on the shelf it would go. But if it were deeply discounted I might be inclined to buy it, even though I wasn’t entirely certain it was for me. 
Then e-books came along and my selection process totally changed. Covers no longer matter, primarily because I don’t browse anymore. It’s too difficult. Besides once I’ve opened up an e-book, I never look at the cover again. And since most e-readers are black and white, a colourful cover is immaterial.   Today, when I buy e-books, I go in search of a specific author and/or a title, either someone whose previous books I have enjoyed or books that have been recommended to me by friends. I rarely rely only on reviews, but if I do, it would be a review by an established, well respected reviewer. 
Awards and award nominations can also influence my choice. But I find that a book that has won an award, possibly several, creates a very high expectation in me. I expect it to be fabulous and when it turns out to be only marginally better than good, I feel let down. And I hate to say it, but it can be the kiss of death for that author. Rarely do I try another one by that person, which is too bad, because I am sure I could be missing out on some good reads. 
I also tend to avoid best sellers, likely because I tend to be a bit of a rebel and like to go against the stream. I am probably the only person in the world who has never read Dan Brown's Da Vince Code. 
I hate to say it, but often what influences me the most today is price. These online e-book sellers are smart. Several times a week they send me emails about the latest deals on authors I have read or who write books similar to the ones in my library. I will check out the book's description, might even do some Internet searching to find out more about the book. And if I like what I read will buy it. I can’t resist a good deal, even though I know the author will get almost next to nothing in royalties. 
I recently started reading Laura Lippman because of a good deal. I’d avoided her primarily because of her best seller status, but when I got the email from Kobo with deep discounts for her early Tess Monaghan books, I said why not. Much to my amazement I find myself quite enjoying them. I initially bought two, then bought two more. But I’m afraid, they are no longer being discounted and since I am one of those people that hates to pay almost as much for an e-book as a printed book, I will have to wait for the next time they are discounted.   
Unfortunately, I am finding that I am reading fewer authors today. Once I find an author I like, I tend to stick with them until I’ve read most of their books, particularly those in a series. When I used to browse in a bookstore, I was more willing to chance on completely unknown authors and would often be pleasantly surprised. I’m afraid the two e-books by unknown authors that I bought through browsing were so bad, I couldn’t finish them. I haven’t dared try it again. 
What about you? What prompts you to read a book? Have you found that you select e-books differently from books in a bookstore? 

Tonight is a big night for me. I’m officially launching Purple Palette for Murder . If you live in the Ottawa area, you are very welcome to join the celebration. We are going to have a grand time. This eighth Meg Harris mystery is doing very well, review-wise. You can check some of them out on Goodreads .

thread.title: Colección Santuario de Colores de Grace Lloper
thread.title_full: Colección Santuario de Colores de Grace Lloper

posts.author: Ester Maria (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Colección Santuario de Colores de Grace Lloper
posts.text:
Autor:  Grace Lloper 
Título: Colección Santuario de colores 
Editorial:  Autopublicado   
Género:  Romantica 
Sinopsis: 
Libro 1 Dibujame 

Me llamo Geraldine, hija única y heredera de August Vin Holden un conocido petrolero, soy artista y poseo todo lo que cualquier mujer desea: belleza, glamour, poder, fama y fortuna. Formo parte del exclusivo jet-set de Los Ángeles, pero… ¿soy feliz? No lo sé, lo dudo. Mi equipaje es muy pesado. Phil Girardon llegó a mi vida como un soplo de aire fresco, lo conocí una tarde mientras corría por la playa, él estaba limpiando la piscina de una de las mansiones de la costa de Malibú donde tengo mi residencia.  Yo necesitaba un modelo para mi siguiente colección de pinturas, lo encaré y él se prestó al juego bajo ciertas condiciones. Las acepté. Me encantaba jugar, y ese trato prometía deliciosas tardes fuera de lo común en mi estudio, o como yo lo llamaba: mi "Santuario de colores". A partir de ese momento y sin buscarlo, los lazos entre nosotros se volvieron cada vez más fuertes y estrechos. Al parecer Phil tenía la extraña cualidad de brindarme lo que yo emocionalmente necesitaba en el momento preciso, sin necesidad de pedírselo.  Pero… ¿qué sabía realmente de él? Solo que estaba cuidando la casa donde vivía, que era un hermoso, dulce y apetitoso sudamericano de algún país que pocos conocen y al cual pronto volvería.  Mientras tanto, fiel a mi forma de ver la vida, disfrutaré de él, aunque me gustaría descubrir más… ¿Me acompañas? 
Páginas:  410 
Precio (en euros):  1,19 

Libro 2 Pintame 

Soy Phil Girardon. Un redomado imbécil, lo sé. En realidad mi nombre completo es Philippe Logiudice Girardon. Nací, me crie y viví toda mi vida en una pequeña ciudad de Latinoamérica que pocos conocen. Adoro mi país: Paraguay. No hay un mejor lugar en el mundo para vivir. Las complicaciones de la vida me llevaron a tener que ocuparme de negocios que odiaba, pero por las personas que amaba tuve que hacerlo. Mi madre y mis hermanas me necesitaban, me había convertido en la cabeza de mi familia, y eso estaba resultando un hueso duro de roer para mí. Conocí a Geraldine Vin Holden en Malibú una tarde, de pura casualidad, y mi mundo entero volteó de repente. Además de hermosa, rica, famosa y con una personalidad explosiva y envolvente, era la hija del hombre a quien yo me tenía que enfrentar. Ajena totalmente a mi identidad, me propuso una locura, la acepté. Deseaba estar cerca de modo a obtener información de primera mano sobre su padre y sus intenciones. Pero la verdad, me salió el tiro por la culata, resultó que ella odiaba a su progenitor tanto como yo. Y ahora ya era tarde… ¿qué podía decirle? ¿Te mentí pero estoy loco por ti? No quiero perderla, pero no tengo idea de cómo resolveré el lio en el que yo mismo me he metido. ¿Lo intentamos juntos? 
Páginas:  420 
Precio (en euros):  1,19 

Libro 3 Cántame una canción 

Ella… Mi realidad era perfecta, una niña de familia con una vida maravillosa y planes bien delineados para el futuro. Tenía el mundo a mis pies, pero el destino siempre nos depara sorpresas. Lo aprendí de una forma trágica, vestida de blanco y esperando en el altar a un novio que nunca se presentó. Me aferré a lo único que tenía a mano: mi sobrina recién nacida, huérfana de madre. Hice ese papel durante cinco años, hasta que mi hermano decidió quitármela. Y ahora… ¿qué será de mi vida? Solo veía una solución.  Decidí llevar a cabo mis planes…  Él… Cantar es mi vida. Lo cual implica viajar, por eso nunca estoy en un mismo lugar más de una semana. Soy famoso, lo sé… y la gente suele suponer que eso es maravilloso. No es así, la soledad es espantosa, e intento sobrellevarla de la única forma que conozco: el sexo.  De gira por Sudamérica la vi sentada en la barra del bar de un hotel en Paraguay. Era preciosa, una de las mujeres más hermosas que había visto en mi vida. Y al parecer deseaba compañía… a mi juego me llamaron. Fui tras ella.  ¡Já! En buen lío me metí… 
Páginas:  404 
Precio (en euros):  1,19  

D arle las gracias a la autora por permitirme leer esta colección  he de confesaros que es lo primero que leo de ella pero desde luego no sera lo ultimo  . Te encuentras nada mas abrir el ebook para leer que es una colección erótica donde las escenas eróticas están muy bien detalladas , tanto que parece que estés siendo la protagonista del libro. 

Encuentras a parte de lo erótico que es una historia con intriga y líos de familia que te quedas con la boca abierta. 

En la segunda parta  esta contada  por la parte masculina de la historia . 

En definitiva me ha sorprendido bastante  estas novelas estas pendiente de todo lo que pasa  desde el principio al final. 

No sabes que leerte aprovecha entra en amazon y busca a Grace Lloper no te arrepentiras

thread.title: NaNoWriMo Reaching the first 10K
thread.title_full: NaNoWriMo Reaching the first 10K

posts.author: mythicalmusingsblog
posts.title: NaNoWriMo Reaching the first 10K
posts.text:
Hey guys,
So we are setting a pace for NaNoWriMo this year! I hope it is starting off well for you!
Now you are getting close to reaching the first 10,000 words of your novel, and that may seem a little daunting to you.
Let me reassure you, the first 10K is the easiest for most writers.
That’s because during the first week your frantic writing, you have all the energy, the fatigue hasn’t set in yet and generally your still motivated.
One thing I recommend is using this to your advantage. Get the first 10K written as fast as possible. I know there is a group on the NaNoWriMo forums that are dedicated to writing 10K on day 1, but not many people actually manage that.
Get yourself involved in the millions of writing sprints available during the month and you’ll find yourself getting further and further ahead. Now is the time to use the momentum to make the later weeks of this month easier for you.
Let me know your current word count in the comments below!
Good luck guys and keep writing!
Helen

thread.title: South African Railroads
thread.title_full: South African Railroads

posts.author: Mikko
posts.title: South African Railroads
posts.text:
Of green 
The green colour of the sidebar is the Brunswick Green used by Nationalised British Railways - Western Region: 
"A different color, also called "Brunswick green", was the colour for passenger locomotives of the Grouping and then the nationalized British Railways. There were three shades of these colours and they are defined under British Standard BS381C - 225, BS381C - 226, and BS381C - 227 (ordered from lightest to darkest). The Brunswick Green used by the Nationalised British Railways - Western Region for passenger Locomotives was BS381C - 227 (rgb(30:62:46)). RAL6005 is a close substitute to BS381C - 227. A characteristic of these colours was the ease for various railway locations to mix them by using whole pots of primary colours - hence the ability to get reasonably consistent colours with manual mixing half a century and more ago." 
Wikipedia: Shades of green South African Railroads 
I bought this game – I was actually the first person to buy the game from Winsome Games when it was first announced. 
The game : South African Railroads by John Bohrer , published by Winsome Games in 2011. 
Elevator pitch : A game of shares, railroads, and auctions set in South Africa, streamlined from the earlier Pampas Railroads and Veld Railroads . 
What’s in the box? The typical Winsome clamshell contains typical Winsome components: plain paper board in two pieces, bunch of wooden cubes, share certificates made from coloured paper and small plastic locomotives for player pieces. Everything is spartan, yet functional. My only gripe is the borders on the board: they are pointless, but too prominent, and just confuse players. 
What do you do in the game? The goal of the game is simple: get more money than everybody else. Money is made by holding shares and getting dividend payments from the railroad companies. 
After the initial auction where the first shares of the companies are auctioned off, players start taking turns. On your turn, you can choose from four different actions: construct track, develop settlements, offer stock and pay dividends. 
The actions are limited: the stock action can be chosen by one player, and the action remains blocked until the next turn of that player, who must then choose a different action. Offer stock is available for two players and develop for three. Construct track is an unlimited action, and you can repeat it turn after turn. 
When you build track, you choose a company where you are the majority shareholder (a shared majority is enough) and either pay $5 for one link or $15 for a double link. The track network is already present on the map, players just place cubes to build the track. The track network is fairly sparse: it’s easy to get slightly blocked. 
Develop action makes stations more valuable. When railroads build links, their income goes up, based on the value of stations on the ends of the link. The focal point of the map is the city of Johannesburg, which slowly develops to be worth up to 10, which is huge. That’ll draw the attention of the railroad companies. 
When offering stock, player chooses one share, which is then auctioned. The auction system is very basic, and the money is paid to the company coffers, funding future track construction. Pay dividends action triggers a round of dividends: each company pays their income, divided by five (each company has five shares) to each share. 
The dividend payments also control the game length: the game is over after the sixth dividend. The dividends are also triggered by the action track: there’s a track that goes from 1 to 35, and each action chosen advances a cube on the track: track-building by 3, development by 4, and a share auction by 5. Once the cube moves off the track, it’s dividend time. The pay dividends action resets the track. 
The sixth, final dividend is paid in a different fashion. It also takes into calculation the company value, which is $5 per link cube on the board. There are also two special areas, which are very expensive, but increase the company value a lot. Also, this final dividend is not divided by five, but by the actual number of outlying shares. A small company with just one or two shares out may pay a lot more than a large company with all five shares out. 
There’s plenty to think about on your turns: controlling your money, the company money in the companies you’re interested in, timing issues, game length control – plenty of meat in this game, but it’s all packed into 40 minutes of play. 
Lucky or skillful? There’s chaos, but no luck. The winner is the player with the best plans and the best calculations. Sometimes other players do unexpected things which can catch you off guard and there’s definitely some psychological factors in play to devalue pure calculation, but the better value calculation usually wins. 
Abstract or thematic? As solid as share-holding cube-pushing railroad games go. The earlier version of this game, Veld Railroads , includes more historical flavour, like the Boer war, but South African Railroads is very streamlined and has no historical flavour outside the names of the cities. It can feel a bit abstract, but the streamlining is worth it. 
Solitaire or interactive? Very interactive. Often someone wants to turtle in a corner with a single-share company, but good players won’t let anybody do that, and will attack aggressively. The board offers lots of chances for blocking, too. The game is brutal. 
Players : 3–6. I’ve yet to try the game with the full six players; I have a feeling that might be interesting. The game does work well with the range from three to five players. 
Who can play? Age recommendation is 42+. That’s John Bohrer’s wry sense of humour, but then again, this is a somewhat demanding game. I’m sure my 11-year-old son would grasp the rules without issues, but I’m fairly sure he’d be pretty far from actually playing well. 
What’s to like : Condenses what used to be a two+ hour game into 40 minutes of pleasantly nasty railroading; very interactive: lots of blocking, co-operation, hostile takeovers. 
What’s not to like : Very hard – borderline impossible – to actually acquire; the Winsome look will turn off the uninitiated; updating the action track is fiddly. 
My verdict : I forgot this game for couple of years, but now that I got back into it, I realized it’s actually one of Winsome Games’ best titles: it’s very short and effective, but also offers lots of depth, variability and plenty of delightful interaction between players. 
Too bad Queen Games (or somebody else) never licensed the game: this one would deserve wider distribution. If you’re a game publisher looking for a meaty game to publish, I urge you to contact John Bohrer to get a license for this gem. 
On the scale of Enthusiastic , Suggest , Indifferent or Avoid , South African Railroads gets Suggest from me. Similar Posts:
